means: 生闷气，愠怒( sulk的名词复数 )
生闷气，愠怒( sulk的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Now she must be tired of my sulks.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在她肯定受够了我的坏脾气。

sentence.Network_en: He remained impervious to all Nell's sulks and blandishments.
sentence.Network_cn: 对尼尔的愠怒和甜言蜜语,他都无动于衷.

sentence.Network_en: That little girl seems to have a fit of the sulks.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个小女孩似乎在生闷气.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I often the sulks ., 我经常一个人生闷气.

list.abs: she is in ( a fit of ) the sulks . = She has ( a fit of ) the sulks .她在发脾气;她在生气。
实用英语短句 _ 上海疯狂英语 ... Small potato. 小人物. Stop sulking. 别生气了. Sweet yummy. 真够味.
He is the sulks today ., 他今天在生闷气.
Jo was in a sulk upstairs ., 乔在楼上生闷气.

entry.tran: 生闷气;面有愠色;闷闷不乐
entry.def: If you sulk, you are silent and bad-tempered for a while because you are annoyed about something.

example.ex: He turned his back and sulked.

auth_sentence.content: It just sulks about having neighbours and disappears.
auth_sentence.res_content: It just sulks about having neighbours and disappears.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It just sulks about having neighbours and disappears.

auth_sentence.content: "Since this incident, Charlene Wittstock sulks ostensibly during family meetings and festivities," it said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Since this incident, Charlene Wittstock sulks ostensibly during family meetings and festivities," it said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Since this incident, Charlene Wittstock sulks ostensibly during family meetings and festivities," it said.

auth_sentence.content: I'd say be brave, give it an ultimatum, try something, don't waste time on a plant that sulks.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd say be brave, give it an ultimatum, try something, don't waste time on a plant that sulks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd say be brave, give it an ultimatum, try something, don't waste time on a plant that sulks.
